keyMappings:
unmapAll
map j scrollDown
map о scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map л scrollUp
map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-в> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp
map <c-г> scrollPageUp
map h goBack
map р goBack
map l goForward
map д goForward
map <space>w LinkHints.activateMode
map <space>ц LinkHints.activateMode
map <space>W LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map <space>Ц LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map gg scrollToTop
map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map П scrollToBottom
map <space>p togglePinTab
map <space>з togglePinTab
